name: Kaneki
quote: Sometimes good people make bad choices. It doesn’t mean they are bad people. It means they’re human

name: Edward
quote: How can you move forward when you keep regretting the past?

name: Takeshi
quote: Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, And the tomorrow might never come

name: Luffy
quote: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams

name: Erza
quote: Moving on doesn’t mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what’s happened and continue living

name: Shigeo
quote: I'm the protagonist of my own life

name: Kagome
quote: I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don’t know what exactly I’ll be able to do for you, but I’ll always be by your side

name: Tanaka
quote: There are some flowers you only see when you take detours

name: Ciel
quote: If we are to die one day, wouldn’t it be better to have no regrets?

name: Roy
quote: The world’s not perfect, but it’s there for us trying the best it can. That’s what makes it so damn beautiful

name: Naruto
quote: If you don’t accept it, instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!

name: Ymir
quote: Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others? You’re you, and there’s nothing wrong with that

name: Shou
quote: However rough the outside world may be, to find your own lighthouse and swim for it is only logical, isn’t it?

name: L
quote: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person

name: Daichi
quote: Even if we’re not confident that we’ll win, even if others tell us we don’t stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that

name: Clive
quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. and once you know your weakness, you can become stronger, as well as kinder

name: Erza
quote: We're alive, aren't we? We don't have any magic power but we're alive! We have strength to overcome the weakness and the fear! That's what it means to be alive.

name: Shintaro
quote: Don’t give up, there’s no shame in falling down! The true shame is to not stand up again!

name: Emilia
quote: I want to understand how you feel. Let me carry your burdens with you

name: Kaizaki
quote: Someday we’ll part. Maybe be forgotten. But we’re living in the moment. So… make lots of friends, fall madly in love, and enjoy every moment to the fullest

name: Guy
quote: It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it

name: Itachi
quote: Those who forgive themselves and are able to accept their true nature..They are the strong ones

name: Glenn
quote: Just walk the path you believe in. And don’t forget, you’re the main character of your own life

name: Leone
quote: The lifespan of a humans is certainly way too short. That’s why you’ve got to make the most of it and live your life to the fullest

name: Natsume
quote: Even if there’s nothing here today, there might be something tomorrow. It’s a caring heat that’s important

name: Alibaba
quote: If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don’t need them and their selfish ideas

name: Sumire
quote: Haven’t you already lifted your foot preparing to step forward? Then you only have one option! Finish taking that step!

name: Nanami
quote: You know that a good long session of weeping often makes you feel better, even if your circumstances have not changed one bit

name: Mary
quote: My life is mine. They can't have it

name: Yumeko
quote: When you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless
